content: A lei supplicando l'afflitta gridò: "Vivendo, volando, che male ti fò? Tu sì mi fai male stringendomi l'ale! Deh, lasciami! Anch'io son figlia di Dio!"
translations: eng:Begging to her, the afflicted cried﹕ Living, flying, how do I hurt you﹖ But you do hurt me, squeezing my wings! Oh, let
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
